tool_description: Timezone data for any location on the planet. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/timezone.
name: Timezone By API-Ninjas
title: Timezone By API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/timezone
api_list.description:
API Ninjas Timezone API endpoint. Returns the timezone name of the specified input location.

Either both (**lat** and **lon**) or (**city**/**state**/**country**) parameters must be set.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: US state name or 2-letter abbreviation (for United States cities only).
